text:
Houston, TX - Onsite - Senior or Lead Developer
Pariveda Solutions is a national technology consulting company. We are looking for passionate technologists to join our team on a full-time, permanent basis in Houston, TX. 
If you have been responsible for resource planning, work estimations, team leadership, mentoring junior developers, etc. and have 3 to 8 years of experience, we are looking for you. 
If you are interested, please email your resume and contact information to shanna.wright@parivedasolutions.com
